## MatchContext type

The part of the context used during a matching run - contains traversal functions and any lookup functions that arbitrary matchers or mocks might need.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MatchContext = DataContext & TraversalFns & ContractLookupFns & HasMakeLookupFn;
```
**References:** [DataContext](./case-plugin-base.datacontext.md)<!-- -->, [TraversalFns](./case-plugin-base.traversalfns.md)<!-- -->, [ContractLookupFns](./case-plugin-base.contractlookupfns.md)
